articles.description: While it is commonly known that heart attacks are more likely to strike early in the morning, can they occur when a person is asleep?
articles.content: The rising incidence of heart attacks has been a cause of concern globally. In an earlier interaction with indianexpress.com, Dr Subhendu Mohanty, Head and Senior Consultant, Sharda Hospital said tha… [+6351 chars]
